titles.title: A resolution to concur in the amendment of the Senate to H.R. 3408, with an amendment.

action.text: Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/6/1988--Introduced. Provides for taking from the Speaker's table H.R. 3408 (Colorado River Storage Project), with the Senate amendment thereto, and agreeing to the Senate amendment with an amendment.
